Package eu.opends.basics

Class MapObject

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.basics.MapObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapObjectOD
public class MapObject
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an additional map object as it is used within class MapFactory in order to place spatial objects on the map.
Author:
Rafael Math

  • Constructor Details

    • MapObject

      public MapObject​(java.lang.String name, com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial, com.jme3.math.Vector3f location, com.jme3.math.Quaternion rotation, com.jme3.math.Vector3f scale, boolean isVisible, boolean addToMapNode, java.lang.String collisionShape, float mass, java.lang.String modelPath, java.lang.String collisionSound, ReferenceObjectParams referenceObjectParams)
      Creates a new map object which can either be a static or dynamic map object (c.f. related sub classes) and provides setter and getter methods for all fields.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the map object.
      spatial - Spatial nodes to add to the scene graph.
      location - Location where the nodes should be added.
      rotation - Rotation of the spatial node.
      scale - Scaling vector of the spatial node.
      isVisible - Defines whether the object is visible to the driver.
      addToMapNode - Defines whether model will be added to map node or scene node
      collisionShape - Defines whether the car can collide with the object.
      mass - Mass of the dynamic map object.
      modelPath - Path to model files
      collisionSound - Sound played when driver car collides with object
      referenceObjectParams - Parameters used if map object is a reference object
